name: ec
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing ec cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`ec` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-ec).

apikey.description: API Key to use for API authentication. The only valid authentication mechanism for the Elasticsearch Service.

endpoint.description: Endpoint where the terraform provider will point to. Defaults to "https://api.elastic-cloud.com".

insecure.description: Allow the provider to skip TLS validation on its outgoing HTTP calls.

password.description:
Password to use for API authentication. Available only when targeting ECE Installations or Elasticsearch Service
Private.

timeout.description: Timeout used for individual HTTP calls. Defaults to "1m".

username.description:
Username to use for API authentication. Available only when targeting ECE Installations or Elasticsearch Service
Private.

verbose.description: When set, a "request.log" file will be written with all outgoing HTTP requests. Defaults to "false".

verboseCredentials.description: When set with verbose, the contents of the Authorization header will not be redacted. Defaults to "false".

verboseFile.description: Timeout used for individual HTTP calls. Defaults to "1m".

provider.description:
The provider type for the ec package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

apikey.description: API Key to use for API authentication. The only valid authentication mechanism for the Elasticsearch Service.

endpoint.description: Endpoint where the terraform provider will point to. Defaults to "https://api.elastic-cloud.com".

insecure.description: Allow the provider to skip TLS validation on its outgoing HTTP calls.

password.description:
Password to use for API authentication. Available only when targeting ECE Installations or Elasticsearch Service
Private.

timeout.description: Timeout used for individual HTTP calls. Defaults to "1m".

username.description:
Username to use for API authentication. Available only when targeting ECE Installations or Elasticsearch Service
Private.

verbose.description: When set, a "request.log" file will be written with all outgoing HTTP requests. Defaults to "false".

verboseCredentials.description: When set with verbose, the contents of the Authorization header will not be redacted. Defaults to "false".

verboseFile.description: Timeout used for individual HTTP calls. Defaults to "1m".

> please consult the source [`terraform-providers/terraform-provider-ec` repo](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-ec/issues).
